Reviews.Author: NicoJakarta

Reviews.Content: quality that matches the price       breakfast buffet
Reviews.Author: nora_lup

Reviews.Content: very well located nice hotel our group had a total of 5 standard room and 2 delux and all were excellent. initially 1 couple had a room at the very back of the hotel on the third floor but after explaining that they found the stair climbing impossible they were moved the very next day. the room i had was very spacious with large bathroom on the ground floor. hotel is situated in the middle of kuta beach very close to poppies lane 2 and a 10 minute walk to matahari shopping centre. if you walked along the beach front you would be at the discovery centre in about same time. the only thing this hotel lacked was night time entertainment and beverage prices were about double compared to bali garden hotel (24000rp against 13000rp sm bintang). overall hotel was very nice with lovely gardens in the centre of kuta beach
Reviews.Author: nat13PerthWa

Reviews.Content: Noisy till 3am, Mosquito filled rooms, Staff spoke poor english       Bed with broken spine
Reviews.Author: ymmit

Reviews.Content: Fantastic hospitality We spent three very happy weeks here, and were treated like VIPs. The hotel is well placed opposite Kuta beach. The room was spotless, and the staff were amazingly attentive. The pool area was very clean, and the pool attendants were very helpful and polite. We cannot praise the service highly enough, and would recommend this hotel to everyone.The food was very good, and offered a variety of choice, but there are many restaurants to choose from in the area that can provide anything from traditional Balinese cuisine to pizza. Overall, the smiling happy staff at this hotel are the best that we have experienced throughout the world, and make this hotel a lovely place to stay. We will definitely stay there again.
Reviews.Author: goldilocks1950

Reviews.Content: A Great Weekend Stay Room a little sparse - no decorationsNo alarm clock/radioChairs a little uncomfortableLight burnt out in bathroomWater pressure low (upper level)Very friendly helpful staffBeautiful surroundings, well maintained groundsGood air conditioningVery good location for a quieter stay right across from the beachWalking distance to shopping, bars, restaurantsSecurity guards at entranceLarge swimming poolGood breakfast selection and well prepared meals in restaurant
Reviews.Author: SamSteel

Reviews.Content: Wonderful stay, would definitely do it again We stayed at the Grand Istana Rama in April this year.The service from all staff was very friendly and always willing to assist.The grounds have beautiful tropical gardens and are well manicured.We spent time relaxing at the pool which is always sparkling clean. We also had a wonderful head and shoulders massage and on another occasion a foot massage. These were done very professionally.The breakfast each morning was delicious - they had a large variety of dishes to chose from. It was also great having the breakfast on the patio which overlooks the beach.The beach is literally opposite the hotel is good for surfing, although we just did the watching.The rooms however are basic but very clean - it was all we really needed.The nice touch was a bowl of the local fruit given to us when we arrived.There were plenty of taxis right outside the hotel which were cheap to take you to where ever you wanted to go.You can also take walks to the markets and of course to the beach.We have fond memories and can definitely recommend.
Reviews.Author: LindaSouthAfrica

Reviews.Content: Only Because of Good Location to Beach I go to Bali every year and have stayed at Istana Rama twice. Maybe because Bali offers so much outside of the hotel resort that I really only need a decent place to rest before am out again, so it didn't really bother me that Istana Rama was quite average.The grounds are huge but you could tell the resort has seen better days. The rooms are OK, clean and comfortable but nothing luxurious for sure. The bathroom is also really basic...we are just glad the toilet flush works and the shower is hot. There is breakfast in the morning (boring toast and eggs), most times we would rather eat out on the streets. We paid a package price but I think the going rate is about USD70 per night and that is steep coz the place is OLD. The only saving grace is the location. Just across the road is Kuta beach in all its glory. We could also get surfing lessons on the grounds of Istana Rama (poolside), so that really worked out for us. We spend most of our time on the beach anyway. All in all, I would say it's passable only if you were going to spend most of your time outside of the hotel room. If you are counting on your resort to give you the experience of Bali, then look elsewhere, there are tons. Try to get a package for this one - I only paid SGD400+ for airfare + 2nights at Istana Rama.
Reviews.Author: booster26
